item.title: JSON Web Tokens Attacks
item.description: JWT Attacks In this section, we’ll look at how design issues and flawed handling of JSON web tokens (JWTs) can leave websites vulnerable to a variety of high-severity attacks. References JWT.IO JWT Vulnerabilities (Json Web Tokens) AllAboutBugBounty/JWT Vulnerabilities.md at master · daffainfo/AllAboutBugBounty HowToHunt/JWT at master · KathanP19/HowToHunt PayloadsAllTheThings/JSON Web Token at master · swisskyrepo/PayloadsAllTheThings GitHub - vavkamil/awesome-bugbounty-tools: A curated list of various bug bounty tools Web Application Penetration Testing Notes
